version_description:
Version 0.5.5 Changes

-Fixed bug where heartbeat could not be heard in terror radius
-Fixed issue wherein player name was not displaying in-game
-Fixed long loading on tally screen
-Fixed some crashes

What's new:
- Michael Myers and Laurie Strode have finally arrived as playable characters in DbD Mobile!
- New map added: explore the Disturbed Ward of The Crotus Prenn Asylum
- Implemented bug and crash fixes
- Mobile optimization

What's New:
- Daily Rewards Calendar: start earning in-game items and resources just by logging in
- Try before you buy: many characters available to try for a limited time using Free Tickets earned through Daily Rewards
- New map added: enter

What's New:
- The Ghost Face joins the playable Character roster
- Complete Daily Rituals to earn rewards
- New Exclusive Mask for the Trapper!
- 4 new maps added to Coldwind Farm: Torment Creek, Rancid Abattoir, The Thompson House and Fra

- Fixed issue where texts were showing up as debug texts
- Fixed issue where Ghost Face indicators were not appearing
- Fixed issue with device language not being set correctly

What's new:
- Prestige is now available on Mobile! Prestige your max-level Characters to earn exclusive rewards
- In-game FAQ: Find all the answers to your questions without leaving the game using our support integration
- Introducing the Ra
